item.title: We 3D-Printed Luigi Mangione’s Ghost Gun. It Was Entirely Legal
item.description: In the wake of Luigi Mangione’s alleged killing of a health care CEO with a partially 3D-printed pistol, we built the exact same weapon ourselves—and ...

item.title: Who Even Is a Criminal Now?
item.description: WIRED loves a rogue. Except rogues ruined the internet. Is there any salvaging the rebellious spirit without destroying everything?

item.title: Bluesky Is Plotting a Total Takeover of the Social Internet
item.description: All the lefties fled to Bluesky following Elon Musk’s Twitter takeover. But CEO Jay Graber says the app is for everyone—and could revolutionize how pe...

item.title: For Tech Whistleblowers, There’s Safety in Numbers
item.description: Amber Scorah and Psst are building a “digital safe” to help people shine a light on the bad things their bosses are doing, without getting found out.

item.title: How to Win Followers and Scamfluence People
item.description: Format Boy makes a living teaching Yahoo Boys, notorious West African scammers, how to use AI and deepfake technology to ensnare their next victims.
